ExecuteAddon.description: Executes the given addon with the given parameters (if possible)

GetAddonDetails.description: Gets the details of a specific addon

params.description: Content provided by the addon. Only considered for plugins and scripts.
params.name: content

GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

Clean.description: Cleans the audio library from non-existent items

params.description: Whether or not to show the progress bar or any other GUI dialog
params.name: showdialogs

GetAlbumDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific album

GetAlbums.description: Retrieve all albums from specified artist (and role) or that has songs of the specified genre

genreid.description: Song genre. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

genre.description: Song genre. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

params.description: Whether or not to include all roles when filtering by artist, rather than the default of excluding other contributions. When true it overrides any role filter value.
params.name: allroles

GetArtistDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific artist

GetArtists.description: Retrieve all artists. For backward compatibility by default this implicitly does not include those that only contribute other roles, however absolutely all artists can be returned using allroles=true

params.description: Whether or not to only include album artists rather than the artists of only individual songs as well. If the parameter is not passed or is passed as null the GUI setting will be used
params.name: albumartistsonly

genreid.description: Deprecated, use songgenreid. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

songgenreid.description: Song genreid. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

genre.description: Deprecated, use songgenre. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

songgenre.description: Song genre. Filter for existence of songs with this genre

roleid.description: Role contributed by artist. Overridden by allroles parameter

role.description: Role contributed by artist. Overridden by allroles parameter

params.description: Whether or not to include all artists irrespective of the role they contributed. When true it overrides any role filter value.
params.name: allroles

GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the music library properties

params.description: The amount of recently added albums from which to return the songs
params.name: albumlimit

GetSources.description: Get all music sources, including unique ID

Scan.description: Scans the audio sources for new library items

params.description: Whether or not to show the progress bar or any other GUI dialog
params.name: showdialogs

AddFavorite.description: Add a favourite with the given details

params.description: Required for media, script and androidapp favourites types
params.name: path

params.description: Required for window favourite type
params.name: window

params.description: The time in milliseconds the notification will be visible
params.name: displaytime

params.description: Button name
params.name: button

params.description: Keymap name (KB, XG, R1, or R2)
params.name: keymap

params.description: Number of milliseconds to simulate button hold.
params.name: holdtime

Home.description: Goes to Home window in GUI

params.description: Unicode text
params.name: text

params.description: Whether this is the whole input or not (closes an open input dialog if true).
params.name: done

ShowCodec.description: Show codec information of the playing item

ShowOSD.description: Show the on-screen display for the current player

ShowPlayerProcessInfo.description: Show player process information of the playing item, like video decoder, pixel format, pvr signal strength

getreferences.description: Whether or not to print the schema for referenced types

id.description: Name of a namespace, method or type

major.description: Bumped on backwards incompatible changes to the API definition

minor.description: Bumped on backwards compatible additions/changes to the API definition

patch.description: Bumped on any changes to the internal implementation but not to the API definition

AddTimer.description: Adds a timer to record the given show one times or a timer rule to record all showings of the given show or adds a reminder timer or reminder timer rule

params.description: the broadcast id of the item to record
params.name: broadcastid

params.description: controls whether to create a timer rule or a onetime timer
params.name: timerrule

params.description: controls whether to create a reminder timer or a recording timer
params.name: reminder

DeleteTimer.description: Deletes a onetime timer or a timer rule

params.description: the id of the onetime timer or timer rule to delete
params.name: timerid

GetBroadcastDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific broadcast

GetBrodcastIsPlayable.description: Retrieves whether or not a broadcast is playable

params.description: the id of the broadcast to to check for playability
params.name: broadcastid

GetBroadcasts.description: Retrieves the program of a specific channel

GetChannelDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific channel

GetChannelGroupDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific channel group

GetChannelGroups.description: Retrieves the channel groups for the specified type

GetClients.description: Retrieves the enabled PVR clients and their capabilities

GetProperties.description: Retrieves the values of the given properties

GetRecordingDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific recording

GetTimeDetails.description: Retrieves the details of a specific timer

params.description: Specify a PVR client id to avoid UI dialog, optional in kodi 19, required in kodi 20
params.name: clientid

ToggleTimer.description: Creates or deletes a onetime timer or timer rule for a given show. If it exists, it will be deleted. If it does not exist, it will be created

params.description: the broadcast id of the item to toggle a onetime timer or time rule for
params.name: broadcastid

params.description: controls whether to create / delete a timer rule or a onetime timer
params.name: timerrule

params.description: Local path or remote URL to the subtitle file to load
params.name: subtitle

GetPlayers.description: Get a list of available players

GoTo.description: Go to previous/next/specific item in the playlist

Move.description: If picture is zoomed move viewport left/right/up/down otherwise skip previous/next

PlayPause.description: Pauses or unpause playback and returns the new state

seconds.description: Seek by the given number of seconds

SetAudioStream.description: Set the audio stream played by the player

type.description: Index of the audio stream to play

GetSettingValue.description: Retrieves the value of a setting

ResetSettingValue.description: Resets the value of a setting

SetSettingValue.description: Changes the value of a setting

EjectOpticalDrive.description: Ejects or closes the optical disc drive (if available)

GetProperties.description: Shuts the system running Kodi down

Hibernate.description: Puts the system running Kodi into hibernate mode

Shutdown.description: Shuts the system running Kodi down

Clean.description: Cleans the video library for non-existent items

params.description: Whether or not to show the progress bar or any other GUI dialog
params.name: showdialogs

params.description: Content type to clean for
params.name: content

params.description: Path to the directory to clean up; performs a global cleanup if not specified
params.name: directory

Export.description: Exports all items from the video library

path.description: Path to the directory to where the data should be exported

images.description: Whether to export thumbnails and fanart images

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite existing exported files

GetEpisodeDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific tv show episode

GetMovieDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific movie

GetMovieSetDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific movie set

GetRecentlyAddedEpisodes.description: Retrieve all recently added tv episodes

GetTVShowDetails.description: Retrieve details about a specific tv show

RefreshEpisode.description: Refresh the given episode in the library

params.description: Whether or not to ignore a local NFO if present.
params.name: ignorenfo

params.description: Title to use for searching (instead of determining it from the item's filename/path).
params.name: title

RefreshMovie.description: Refresh the given movie in the library

params.description: Whether or not to ignore a local NFO if present.
params.name: ignorenfo

params.description: Title to use for searching (instead of determining it from the item's filename/path).
params.name: title

RefreshTVShow.description: Refresh the given tv show in the library

params.description: Whether or not to ignore a local NFO if present.
params.name: ignorenfo

params.description: Whether or not to refresh all episodes belonging to the TV show.
params.name: refreshepisodes

params.description: Title to use for searching (instead of determining it from the item's filename/path).
params.name: title

Scan.description: Scans the video sources for new library items

params.description: Whether or not to show the progress bar or any other GUI dialog
params.name: showdialogs

items.description: Requesting the songgenres, artistid and/or sourceid fields will result in increased response times
Requesting the (song)genreid/genre, roleid/role or sourceid fields will result in increased response times
Requesting the cast, ratings, showlink, streamdetails, uniqueid and/or tag field will result in increased response times
